message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll really love. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $12000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $10500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet you at $10200?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
